backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user data types (profiles, plans, metrics, settings) and CRUD operations for storing and retrieving user data by Principal, with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user data schema (with timeWindows field) to new schema (without timeWindows) by mapping user profiles and preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting removal of time windows selection step from onboarding, elimination of time window data fields from state management, and removal of RemindersConfig component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including hooks, pages, and UI components for onboarding, reset flow, library, plan management, progress tracking, and settings.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light/dark themes, accessibility features, and design tokens for the warm, calming UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and root div for React app mounting, titled 'Tranquility Lounge Psychological Tuning'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query, TanStack Router with all routes, theme provider, accessibility provider, and splash/crisis disclaimer flow on initial load.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Intens: Dashboard card component with slider (0-10) for logging current intensity level and optional text input for describing emotional state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickA: Dashboard component displaying four quick-access navigation cards (Reset, My Plan, Library, Progress) with icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Streak: Displays a user's consecutive daily check-in streak using localStorage to track last check-in date and count, with logic to increment, maintain, or reset the streak.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Sugges: Shows personalized action suggestions based on user progress, recommending either a first Reset, library exploration, or continued learning with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper that conditionally renders navigation bar and reset button, hiding them on splash, crisis, and onboarding pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Bottom navigation bar (top on desktop) with five main sections: Home, Library, Tools, Progress, and Settings, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/layout/ResetButt: Floating action button that navigates to the Reset page, positioned bottom-right and hidden when already on the Reset page.
frontend/src/components/library/Category: Renders a section of lessons filtered by category with a title, description, and grid of lesson cards.
frontend/src/components/library/LessonCa: Displays a lesson card with category badge, completion status, estimated duration, and button to start or review the lesson.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Escal: Onboarding step for selecting escalation patterns (racing mind, irritability, shutdown, etc.) with checkboxes and icon-based cards.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/GoalF: Onboarding step for selecting a primary goal focus area (stress regulation, sleep, productivity, etc.) with single-select cards.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Prefe: Onboarding step for selecting preferred regulation tools (breath work, audio guidance, journaling, etc.) with multi-select checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Reset: Final onboarding step that displays the generated personalized Reset plan summary with crisis disclaimer and completion button.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepI: A visual step indicator component that displays progress through a multi-step process with numbered circles, check marks for completed steps, and connecting lines between steps.
frontend/src/components/plan/DailyRoutin: A placeholder card component for creating up to 3 daily routines (morning, midday, evening) with a coming soon message and an Add Routine button.
frontend/src/components/plan/ResetSequen: Displays the user's personalized reset sequence steps with their names and core questions in styled cards, fetched from user data.
frontend/src/components/plan/ToolPrefere: Displays the user's preferred regulation tools and practices as badges, fetching data from the user's personalized plan.
frontend/src/components/progress/DailyMe: A form with three sliders (sleep quality, focus readiness, energy level) rated 1-5 that saves daily metrics to user data with date stamps.
frontend/src/components/progress/HabitTr: A placeholder card component for tracking daily habits with a coming soon message and an Add Habit button.
frontend/src/components/progress/Regulat: Displays regulation ratings showing average intensity reduction per reset and a list of the 5 most recent reset sessions with before/after comparisons.
frontend/src/components/progress/WeeklyI: Generates and displays personalized insights based on regulation ratings, reset count, and favorite tools, with fallback messaging for new users.
frontend/src/components/reset/ActStep.ts: A step in the reset flow where users select one micro-action from six options (communicate, move, pause, connect, learn, complete) displayed as clickable cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/reset/AnchorStep: A step allowing users to optionally select environment adjustments (lighting, sound, scent, posture, screens) via checkboxes with navigation buttons.
Final reset step where users rate their current intensity after the reset, showing before/after comparison with visual indicators for increase, decrease, or no change.
frontend/src/components/reset/CoreStep.t: A form step component for the 'Core' phase of emotional reset, prompting users to write their interpretation of what's really happening beneath their surface emotions. Includes a textarea input with validation requiring non-empty content.
frontend/src/components/reset/NameItStep: A form step component for the 'Name It' phase where users rate emotional intensity (0-10 slider) and select from six predefined emotional states (overwhelmed, anxious, frustrated, sad, numb, restless). Validates that both intensity and state are selected.
frontend/src/components/reset/RegulateSt: A form step component for selecting a regulation practice tool (paced breathing, grounding, or audio guidance) with duration estimates. Includes back/continue navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/settings/AboutSe: Displays app information including version (1.0.0), copyright for Valentina D. Diaconu, and a footer link crediting caffeine.ai as the build platform.
frontend/src/components/settings/Accessi: Provides accessibility controls for text size (small/medium/large) and high contrast mode toggle, persisting preferences to user data via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/settings/CrisisI: Displays UK emergency crisis contact information (999, Samaritans, SHOUT, NHS 111) with a disclaimer that the app is not a substitute for professional care or emergency services.
frontend/src/components/settings/DataExp: Provides a button to export all user data (profile, plans, tracking metrics, local storage) as a timestamped JSON file download.
frontend/src/components/settings/DeleteA: Implements account deletion with a confirmation dialog requiring the user to type 'DELETE', then calls the delete mutation and redirects to onboarding.
frontend/src/components/settings/Emergen: Displays UK crisis hotlines (Samaritans, NHS 111) and user-saved emergency contacts with phone numbers, plus an 'Add Contact' button.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolCard.t: Displays a tool card with name, category, favorite toggle (star icon), and 'Open Tool' button. Manages favorite status by updating user data via API mutation.
frontend/src/data/lessons.ts: Defines the Lesson interface and exports an array of lesson content covering cognitive patterns, flexibility, and emotion regulation with practice exercises and journal prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessibility.ts: Provides a React context and hook for managing accessibility settings (text size and high contrast mode), syncing with user data and applying CSS custom properties to the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Manages onboarding flow state across 4 steps, tracking user selections for goal focus, escalation patterns, preferred tools, and reset plan.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, including profile, ratings, habits, favorite tools, emergency contacts, and accessibility settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetFlow.ts: Manages a 7-step reset flow state, tracking intensity ratings, current state, regulation tools, interpretations, actions, and environment adjustments.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark/high-contrast modes), dynamic text sizing, and color tokens using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CrisisDisclaimer.tsx: Displays a crisis disclaimer page with UK emergency contact numbers and requires user acknowledgment via checkbox before allowing navigation to onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that redirects to onboarding if not completed, displays welcome message, intensity check, suggested next steps, streak display, and quick access buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Lesson.tsx: Displays individual lesson content with title, estimated time, practice exercises, micro-tasks, and journal prompts; tracks completion in localStorage and allows navigation back to library.
frontend/src/pages/Library.tsx: Library page with search functionality and tabbed interface organizing psychoeducation lessons by the Four-Level Regulation Model categories (Core, Regulate, Act, Anchor).
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Multi-step onboarding flow collecting user's goal focus, escalation patterns, preferred tools, and reset plan; saves data to backend and navigates to dashboard upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/Plan.tsx: Tabbed interface for managing personalized regulation plan including daily routines, reset sequence customization, and tool preferences.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Displays comprehensive privacy policy explaining data collection, storage (blockchain and local), usage, GDPR rights, retention, and security measures with navigation back to settings.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Progress tracking page with tabs for regulation charts, daily metrics logging, and habit tracking, plus weekly insights display.
frontend/src/pages/Reset.tsx: Main Reset flow page implementing the guided 7-step regulation process (Name It, Regulate, Core, Act, Anchor, Close) with progress tracking, step validation, and saving regulation ratings to user data upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page providing access to accessibility options, emergency contacts, crisis information, data export, account deletion, and about section organized in card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/Splash.tsx: Splash screen displaying 'Tranquility Lounge Psychological Tuning' branding with copyright attribution to Valentina D. Diaconu and animated loading indicator.
frontend/src/pages/Tools.tsx: Tools library page organizing regulation, core, behaviour, and environment tools in tabs with favorites filter toggle and grid-based tool card display.
frontend/src/utils/language.ts: Language utility defining supportive, non-pathologizing terminology constants and helper function for context-appropriate supportive messages, avoiding clinical/diagnostic terms.
frontend/src/utils/localStorage.ts: Local storage utility for managing sensitive user data (journal entries, private notes, detailed logs) with store, retrieve, clear, and export functions.
frontend/src/utils/offlineStorage.ts: Offline caching utility for tool data with functions to cache, retrieve, and check online status for offline-first functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH color space, extended theme with animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing the Four-Level Regulation Model architecture, MVP scope, British English non-pathologizing language requirements, and known navigation blocking issue requiring fix.
